item.title: CVE-2024-37264|2024-07-22T20:28:41.030Z -- groundhogg%20inc. -- groundhogg
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Groundhogg Inc. Groundhogg allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Groundhogg: from n/a through 3.4.2.3.
